    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PMO_DemoData</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>PMO_DemoData</name>
        <script><![CDATA[/**
 * PMO demo data script
 * Used to generate data for demo purposes
 * @author Martin.Xia
 */
var PMO_DemoData = Class.create();
var defaultBudgetModel = {
	"name": "Project Financials Budget Model",
	"sys_id": "2ba0691767101200c5a31dcd37415a5c"
};
PMO_DemoData.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {


	runPMODemoData : function() {
		if (!gs.hasRole("budget_admin")) {
			gs.warn("PMO Demo Data Error: user does not have authorization to populate PMO demo data. Aborted.");
			return;
		}
		gs.info("=========================== PMO Demo Data =============================");

		gs.info("====================== Generate Budget Actuals ========================");
		try{
			this.generateBudgetActuals();
		}
		catch(e) {
			gs.warn("PMO Demo Data Error: " + e);
		}

		gs.info("======================= Promote Budget Plans ==========================");
		try{
			this.promoteBudgetPlans();
		}
		catch(e) {
			gs.warn("PMO Demo Data Error: " + e);
		}

		gs.info("======================= Create Final Budget ==========================");
		try{
			this.createFinalBudget();
		}
		catch(e) {
			gs.warn("PMO Demo Data Error: " + e);
		}
	},

	promoteBudgetPlans: function() {
		var budgetingScriptable = new SNC.BudgetingScriptable();
		var itfmBudgeting = new ITFM_Budgeting();
		var budgetPlan = new GlideRecord('itfm_budget_plan');
		budgetPlan.query();
		while(budgetPlan.next()){
			//only promote budget plans in "Project Financials Budget Model"
			var bk = budgetPlan.budget_key;
			var bkGr = new GlideRecord('itfm_budget_key');
			bkGr.addQuery('cost_model',defaultBudgetModel.sys_id);
			bkGr.addQuery('sys_id',bk);
			bkGr.query();
			if(!bkGr.next())
				continue;

			if(budgetingScriptable.isPromote(budgetPlan.sys_id)
			   && itfmBudgeting.isPromoteVisible(budgetPlan)){
				budgetingScriptable.promoteBudgetPlan(budgetPlan.sys_id);
			}
		}
	},

	createFinalBudget: function() {
		var budgetCount = 0;
		var ga = new GlideAggregate('itfm_bf_breakdown');
		ga.groupBy('budget_forecast');
		ga.groupBy('fiscal_period.parent_period');
		ga.addAggregate('SUM','cost');
		ga.query();
		while(ga.next()) {
			var bk = ga.budget_forecast.budget_key;
			var bkGr = new GlideRecord('itfm_budget_key');
			bkGr.addQuery('cost_model', defaultBudgetModel.sys_id);
			bkGr.addQuery('sys_id',bk);
			bkGr.query();
			if(!bkGr.next())
				continue;

			//initialize final budget
			var budget = new GlideRecord("itfm_budget");
			budget.initialize();
			budget.budget_key = bk;
			budget.cost_model = defaultBudgetModel.sys_id;
			budget.fiscal_period = ga.getValue("fiscal_period.parent_period");
			budget.account_number = ga.budget_forecast.account_number;
			budget.amount = ga.getAggregate('SUM','cost');
			budget.number = "BDGT_" + "BUG"+ "_" + ('00000' + budgetCount++).slice(-5);
			budget.insert();
		}
	},

	generateBudgetActuals: function() {
		new SNC.BudgetingScriptable().
		generateActualsForAllFiscalPeriods(defaultBudgetModel.sys_id);
	},

    type: 'PMO_DemoData'
});]]></script>
